author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Worst promo EVER
review:
Opening;

This is a cool pencil case and the extra stuff inside is nice but....why is this a promo two years in a row this is terrible for a promotion .

In conclusion-

 They should be polybags , minifigure packs or small sets not picnic blankets , art prints or pencil cases . Please stop doing these promos .
